entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 12:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Overcast. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening and ending before morning then 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
